actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-579.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-474.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 1,000 additional copies of the hearings before the Subcommittee on the Near East of the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "U.S. Interests in and Policy Toward the Persian Gulf".

summary.text: Provides for the printing of one thousand additional copies of the hearings before the Subcommittee on the Near East of the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "U.S. Interests In and Policy Toward the Persian Gulf" for the use of such Subcommittee.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 1,000 additional copies of the hearings before the Subcommittee on the Near East of the Committee on Foreign Affairs entitled "U.S. Interests in and Policy Toward the Persian Gulf".
